<ROLE=EXECUTOR>/n/n
<BUCKET=A>/n/n
<UI_INTENT>/n
{
  "strategy_id": "safety_trust_then_inquiry",
  "primary_focus": "authority",
  "cta_policy": {
    "timing": "immediate",
    "intensity": "soft"
  },
  "proof_policy": "heavy",
  "content_density": "high",
  "motion_policy": "none",
  "creative_license": "none",
  "language_style": "precise",
  "interaction_restraint": "strict"
}/n/n
<CDO_BRIEF>/n
{
  "primary_intent": "signal_safety_legitimacy_and_enable_inquiry",
  "key_risks": [
    "low_trust",
    "overpromising_safety",
    "premature_cta",
    "feature_confusion"
  ],
  "strategic_principles": [
    "credibility_over_creativity",
    "measured_claims_only",
    "proof_near_decision_points",
    "clarity_before_conversion"
  ],
  "avoidances": [
    "aggressive_sales_language",
    "absolute_security_claims",
    "flashy_motion",
    "brand_storytelling_fluff"
  ],
  "strategies": [
    {
      "strategy_id": "safety_trust_then_inquiry",
      "intent": "convert_visitors_to_structured_inquiries",
      "hero_focus": "safety_value_prop",
      "information_order": [
        "headline",
        "subheadline",
        "primary_cta",
        "secondary_cta",
        "why_choose_us_benefits",
        "scale_proof",
        "industries_served",
        "feature_comparison",
        "faq",
        "testimonials",
        "final_cta",
        "footer"
      ],
      "risk_controls": [
        "soften_cta_language",
        "reinforce_trust_before_quote",
        "use_specific_benefits_not_hype"
      ]
    },
    {
      "strategy_id": "proof_led_reassurance",
      "intent": "reduce_anxiety_then_prompt_action",
      "hero_focus": "reassurance_plus_social_proof",
      "information_order": [
        "headline",
        "subheadline",
        "scale_proof",
        "why_choose_us_benefits",
        "feature_comparison",
        "faq_security",
        "testimonials",
        "primary_cta",
        "footer"
      ],
      "risk_controls": [
        "put_proof_above_features",
        "answer_security_questions_early",
        "avoid_multiple_primary_ctas"
      ]
    },
    {
      "strategy_id": "comparison_clarity_first",
      "intent": "win_by_clear_differentiation",
      "hero_focus": "simple_promise_plus_clarity",
      "information_order": [
        "headline",
        "subheadline",
        "why_choose_us_benefits",
        "feature_comparison",
        "industries_served",
        "faq",
        "testimonials",
        "primary_cta",
        "footer"
      ],
      "risk_controls": [
        "keep_comparison_scannable",
        "avoid_feature_bloat",
        "use_consistent_terms"
      ]
    }
  ]
}/n/n
<SELECTED_STRATEGY>/n

<TASK>/n
Create a conservative, trust-first landing page for a home safety and security product called “HomeGuardian”. Include a clear hero with two CTAs (“Make a Request” and “Learn More”), a benefits section, a scale/proof statement, industries served, a feature comparison table, FAQs, testimonials, and a “Get a free quote” CTA later on the page.
/n/n

<ROLE=EXECUTOR>\n\n
<BUCKET=B>\n\n
<UI_INTENT>\n
{
  "strategy_id": "conversion_with_proof",
  "primary_focus": "conversion",
  "cta_policy": {
    "timing": "immediate",
    "intensity": "medium"
  },
  "proof_policy": "heavy",
  "content_density": "high",
  "motion_policy": "subtle",
  "creative_license": "restricted",
  "language_style": "approachable",
  "interaction_restraint": "moderate"
}\n\n
<CDO_BRIEF>\n
{
  "primary_intent": "drive_signup_with_high_proof",
  "key_risks": ["low_trust", "cta_competition", "pricing_friction"],
  "strategic_principles": [
    "clarity_before_cleverness",
    "cta_visible_but_not_pushy",
    "proof_near_decisions"
  ],
  "avoidances": ["vague_claims", "cta_overload", "excessive_motion"],
  "strategies": [
  {
    "strategy_id": "conversion_with_proof",
    "intent": "maximize_signup",
    "hero_focus": "value_prop_plus_primary_cta",
    "information_order": [
      "headline",
      "subheadline",
      "primary_cta",
      "product_visual",
      "customer_logos",
      "features",
      "pricing",
      "testimonials",
      "final_cta",
      "footer"
    ],
    "risk_controls": ["keep_cta_copy_soft", "anchor_pricing_with_value", "place_proof_near_pricing"]
  },
  {
    "strategy_id": "product_clarity_first",
    "intent": "reduce_uncertainty_before_action",
    "hero_focus": "what_it_does_and_for_whom",
    "information_order": [
      "headline",
      "subheadline",
      "product_visual",
      "key_benefits",
      "customer_logos",
      "how_it_works",
      "testimonials",
      "pricing",
      "primary_cta",
      "footer"
    ],
    "risk_controls": ["avoid_claims_without_examples", "use_concrete_benefits", "defer_pricing_until_value_is_clear"]
  },
  {
    "strategy_id": "pricing_led_transparency",
    "intent": "win_by_clear_pricing_and_comparability",
    "hero_focus": "simple_promise_plus_pricing_anchor",
    "information_order": [
      "headline",
      "subheadline",
      "customer_logos",
      "pricing",
      "plan_comparison",
      "features",
      "testimonials",
      "primary_cta",
      "faq",
      "footer"
    ],
    "risk_controls": ["minimize_plan_confusion", "limit_cta_variants", "reinforce_value_per_tier"]
  }
]
}\n\n
<SELECTED_STRATEGY>\n
{
    "strategy_id": "conversion_with_proof",
    "intent": "maximize_signup",
    "hero_focus": "value_prop_plus_primary_cta",
    "information_order": [
      "headline",
      "subheadline",
      "primary_cta",
      "product_visual",
      "customer_logos",
      "features",
      "pricing",
      "testimonials",
      "final_cta",
      "footer"
    ],
    "risk_controls": ["keep_cta_copy_soft", "anchor_pricing_with_value", "place_proof_near_pricing"]
}\n\n
<TASK>\n
Create a modern landing page for a new SaaS product called “Nova”. It should explain the product clearly, show key features, include customer logos and testimonials, and end with a pricing section and a strong final call-to-action to get started.
\n\n

<ROLE=EXECUTOR>

<BUCKET=C>

<UI_INTENT>
{
  "strategy_id": "personality_plus_work_showcase",
  "primary_focus": "brand_expression",
  "cta_policy": {
    "timing": "delayed",
    "intensity": "soft"
  },
  "proof_policy": "qualitative",
  "content_density": "medium",
  "motion_policy": "expressive",
  "creative_license": "expressive",
  "language_style": "confident",
  "interaction_restraint": "moderate"
}

<CDO_BRIEF>
{
  "primary_intent": "establish_personal_brand_and_showcase_work_then_invite_contact",
  "key_risks": [
    "appearing_generic",
    "work_not_visible_early",
    "tone_overpowers_clarity",
    "contact_friction"
  ],
  "strategic_principles": [
    "identity_is_the_hook",
    "work_is_the_proof",
    "keep_navigation_light_and_scroll_led",
    "invite_contact_without_pressure"
  ],
  "avoidances": [
    "corporate_saas_tone",
    "aggressive_sales_ctas",
    "dense_text_blocks_without_breaks",
    "minimalist_blankness_without_personality"
  ],
  "strategies": [
    {
      "strategy_id": "personality_plus_work_showcase",
      "intent": "hook_with_voice_then_validate_with_projects",
      "hero_focus": "identity_statement_plus_roles",
      "information_order": [
        "availability_badge",
        "hero_identity_statement",
        "role_stack",
        "showcase_gallery",
        "projects_grid",
        "personal_manifesto_or_voice_block",
        "experience_history",
        "contact_invite",
        "social_links_footer"
      ],
      "risk_controls": [
        "keep_copy_scannable",
        "ensure_projects_have_clear_ctas",
        "use_motion_as_storytelling_not_noise",
        "make_contact_one_step"
      ]
    },
    {
      "strategy_id": "work_first_minimal_friction",
      "intent": "lead_with_portfolio_then_add_context",
      "hero_focus": "projects_immediately_visible",
      "information_order": [
        "availability_badge",
        "hero",
        "projects_grid",
        "selected_case_studies",
        "services_or_capabilities",
        "experience_history",
        "contact_cta",
        "footer"
      ],
      "risk_controls": [
        "reduce_intro_copy",
        "keep_case_studies_short",
        "contact_cta_after_proof"
      ]
    },
    {
      "strategy_id": "credibility_timeline_then_work",
      "intent": "use_experience_as_trust_anchor",
      "hero_focus": "roles_and_credibility",
      "information_order": [
        "availability_badge",
        "hero_identity_statement",
        "role_stack",
        "experience_history",
        "projects_grid",
        "testimonials_or_quotes_optional",
        "contact_invite",
        "footer"
      ],
      "risk_controls": [
        "avoid_overclaiming",
        "keep_experience_entries_consistent",
        "ensure_work_still_appears_above_fold"
      ]
    }
  ]
}

<TASK>
Create a modern, expressive portfolio website for a designer/developer named “YCF”. It should include an availability status, a bold hero identity statement, a short list of roles (design engineer, product designer, UX designer, frontend engineer), a visual showcase gallery, a projects section with “view case” links, an experience history timeline, and a “Let’s work together” contact section with social links in the footer.

<ROLE=EXECUTOR>\n\n
<BUCKET=C>\n\n
<UI_INTENT>\n
{
  "strategy_id": "brand_authority_through_work",
  "primary_focus": "brand_expression",
  "cta_policy": {
    "timing": "delayed",
    "intensity": "soft"
  },
  "proof_policy": "qualitative",

      "headline",
      "subheadline",
      "selected_work",

      "testimonials",
      "primary_cta",
      "footer"

    "risk_controls": [

    "hero_focus": "distinctive_point_of_view",
    "information_order": [
      "headline",
      "subheadline",
      "manifesto_or_philosophy",

      "services",
      "testimonials",
      "contact_cta",
      "footer"

    "risk_controls": [

]

<TASK>\n
Create a launch landing page for a creative digital agency called “Veo Studio”. The page should introduce the agency with a strong brand statement, showcase selected work/portfolio, describe services and process, include testimonials or client proof, and end with a low-pressure contact CTA for booking a call or starting a project.
\n\n

<TASK>/n
Create a trust-first landing page for a professional software product. The page should emphasize credibility and authority, highlight customer logos, usage statistics, and testimonials early, explain features and integrations clearly, present pricing transparently, answer common questions, and include a low-pressure call-to-action near the end.
/n/n
